title: fiora's useless passive needs a rework
body:
current passive:
fiora regenerates 7 + level health on hit over 6 seconds on-hit, stacking 4 times on champions
we all know how useless this passive is all game

how about we change her passive to, 
each successful hit or parry, fiora gains 3% lifesteal for 4 seconds, stacking 3 times on champions/monsters

it might sound like a strong passive, but it would make her a duelist at least

replies.body:
Ha. Haha. Hahaha. Hahahaha. HAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHA.

Oh. You were serious.
or you could just make a joke instead of actually explaining why this a bad idea or where numbers could be changed, thats fine too.

At level 1 alone, she can stack it up to a maximum of 32 hp over 6 secs, which is roughly 5 hp per sec once she manage to land 4 attacks on enemy champ, at level 1. There is no internal cd too, so it's pretty much lifesteal for her, just doesn't scale as well as one.

It's not useless, it's just not the best thing ever.

A useless passive would be something like Sion's new passive.

There are better ways to change a passive without simply making it blatantly OP.
Don't think OP realise this 32 HP is the difference between walking away with 10 hp winning the first kill or getting killed.

It's a bad idea because this would promote her snowballing even harder.

Her passive is there to give her some sustain when she's in a hard time (gettin' rekt by Darius is more like it) not to help her kill her lane opponent even easier. If her passive gave lifesteal, her scaling with AD would be even stupider, making her harder to duel, making her a stronger snowball champion.

It's stupid enough that she gets free AD off her W which is why I always feel compelled to max it first...should move that AD to her ult.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2014/08/red-post-collection-fiora-rework.html

They haven't really explained a lot of what they are doing...
But they do plan on reworking Fiora.
